channel.title: Raspberry Pi on Dan Skaf
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberry Pi on Dan Skaf

item.title: Hosted on My Pi
item.description: This site is hosted using Apache web server on Raspberry Pi OS. As a brief guide: Ensure all repos and packages are up to date. Install the Apache server and enable the ssl and rewrite modules for https support. Enable the service to start at boot. Copy the html files to the webserver directory.
